titles.title: Airline Ticket Tax bill
Airport and Airway Trust Fund Tax Reinstatement Act of 1997
Airport and Airway Trust Fund Tax Reinstatement Act of 1997
Airport and Airway Trust Fund Tax Reinstatement Act of 1997
Airport and Airway Trust Fund Tax Reinstatement Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reinstate the Airport and Airway Trust Fund excise taxes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 105-5.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 4.

action.text: Mr. Archer moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed until Feb. 26.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 347 - 73 (Roll no. 27).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 19.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/11/1997--Introduced. Airport and Airway Trust Fund Tax Reinstatement Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore the Airport and Airway Trust Fund excise taxes. Extends authority to transfer revenue to such Fund.
